title: Ukrainian troops hold out as Russia assaults Sievierodonetsk wasteland
content:
1. Ukrainian troops hold out as Russia assaults Sievierodonetsk wasteland  Reuters
  2. 'I watched from afar Russia’s latest merciless assault on Severodonetsk'  BBC
  3. Russia intensifies it's assault, threatening to encircle the key city of Severodonetsk  6abc Philadelphia
  4. Russians, Ukrainians fight block by block in eastern city  The Associated Press
  5. Live updates | Mayor says half of Sievierodonetsk captured  KTSM 9 News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
